about.summary: Specialist in the React and Node ecosystem, legacy system modernization and modular architecture design. I am always looking to improve my skills and knowledge, staying updated with new technologies and market trends. Focusing on delivering high-performance, user-centered solutions with measurable business impact.

experience.title: Experience
experience.descriptionRbs: Designed and implemented a complete Pix-based content monetization flow within a major news portal. Integrated a new payment gateway and adapted the product architecture to support per-article segmentation and individual purchases. Enabled access to a broader audience less likely to subscribe to recurring plans, increasing conversion through one-time purchases.
experience.descriptionGenialnet: Responsible for front-end development in migrating a legacy desktop system to a web platform, implementing a modular architecture designed to ensure scalability, maintainability, and low coupling between modules. Designed and implemented a proprietary design system, enhancing brand consistency and significantly accelerating the development lifecycle of new modules.
experience.descriptionAgrtec: Involved in the design and development of an e-commerce application focused on agricultural products. Integrated multiple external APIs (commodities, weather, payments, and news), significantly enhancing the functional value of the product.
experience.descriptionGesec: Actively participated in a web application for a Video Management System (VMS) supporting over 64 cameras. Implemented critical functionalities integrated with IP cameras and sensors via WebSocket protocol, focusing on centralized monitoring and real-time access control. Led equipment certification efforts across multiple manufacturers, working with proprietary SDKs, REST APIs, and the ONVIF standard.
experience.descriptionGeosapiens: Interned in the QA team, working on requirements gathering, test planning, and developing end-to-end (E2E) automated tests for web and mobile platforms.

projectCommodities.title: Agricultural Commodities Broker
projectCommodities.description: Developed a web application for an agricultural commodities broker. The platform includes integrations with APIs for quotes, chatbot, and a comprehensive dashboard to manage clients, contracts, and quotes.

customLandingPages.title: Custom Landing Pages
customLandingPages.description: Developed and maintained custom institutional websites for companies across various sectors, focusing on visual appeal, usability, SEO, and responsiveness to ensure a complete user experience across different devices.

nextStepApp.title: Next Step App
nextStepApp.description: A mobile app for task and personal goal management, built with Expo and React Native. It allows users to organize daily tasks and set short- and long-term goals. The app features an easy-to-use interface with light and dark themes to suit user preferences.

notificationsMicroservice.title: Notifications Microservice
notificationsMicroservice.description: A notifications microservice built with Node and NestJS, designed for real-time notification management. This project served as a reference for studying and exploring the NestJS framework.

cleanArchitectureApi.title: Clean Architecture API
cleanArchitectureApi.description: A Node.js REST API for user registration, used to study design patterns and best development practices. It served as a reference for learning about Clean Architecture and SOLID principles.

discordBot.title: Discord Bot
discordBot.description: A Discord bot written in JavaScript, utilizing the Paladins game API to provide detailed information about player accounts and matches, offering an interactive and informative experience within the Discord platform.
